ResourceHeader.ResourceName: THEMIS-D Definitive Ephemeris and Spin Attitude Corrections (CDF)
ResourceHeader.Description:
This dataset contains THEMIS-D  position, velocity, attitude and sun pulse data.
The data are definitive  with added science attitude determination using perigee data post-processing.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D position vector in GEI coordinates
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-D position vector (km) in GEI coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D velocity vector  in GEI coordinates
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-D velocity vector (km/s) in GEI coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Maneuver Flag
Parameter.Description:
THEMIS-D maneuver status code (XYYZZZ). Values indicate if/what maneuver is being performed.  Spacecraft data will be unreliable during maneuvers.
      * Unpowered flight (Coast):
          - X=0, Y=00, Z=000            
      * Sequence Code X:
          - 0= No Segmentation
          - 1= Segmented Maneuver
      * Type Code YY:
          - 0= No Maneuver
          - 1= Axial-thrust Maneuver
          - 2= Side-thrust Maneuver
          - 3= Beta-thrust Maneuver
          - 4= Attitude Precession
          - 5= Spin-Rate Change
      * Sequence Number ZZZ:
          - 001-999= Maneuver Sequence Number

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D RoI
Parameter.Description:
Region of interest. Different bits of this parameter give a general indication of the region that the spacecraft is in.  The first 18 bits are significant.  An active bit indicates the spacecraft is in a given region.  Multiple bits may be set simultaneously. The value of the bit is in parentheses in the following table.

          +---------------------------------------------------+
          | Bit 1(1)      | Earth Shadow                      |
          | Bit 2(2)      | Lunar Shadow                      |
          | Bit 3(4)      | Atmospheric absorbtion zone       |
          | Bit 4(8)      | South Atlantic Anomaly            |
          | Bit 5(16)     | Northern Auroral Zone             |
          | Bit 6(32)     | Southern Auroral Zone             |
          | Bit 7(64)     | Perigee Passage                   |
          | Bit 8(128)    | Inner & Outer Radiation Belts |
          | Bit 9(256)    | Deep Plasma Sphere                |
          | Bit 10(512)   | Foreshock Solar Wind              |
          | Bit 11(1024)  | Solar Wind Beam                   |
          | Bit 12(2048)  | High Magnetic Field               |
          | Bit 13(4096)  | Average Plasma Sheet              |
          | Bit 14(8192)  | Bowshock Crossing                 |
          | Bit 15(16384) | Magnetopause Crossing             |
          | Bit 16(32768) | Ground Based Observatories        |
          | Bit 17(65536) | 2-Day Conjunctions                |
          | Bit 18(131072)| 4-Day Conjunctions                |
          +---------------------------------------------------+

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D spin axis right ascension
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-D spin axis right ascension in GEI coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D spin axis declination in GEI coordinates
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-D spin axis declination in GEI coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D spin axis azimuth, Euler alpha, in Probe Geometric (SPG) coordinates
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-D spin axis azimuth, Euler alpha, in Probe Geometric (SPG) coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D spin axis colatitude, Euler beta, in Probe Geometric (SPG) coordinates
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-D spin axis colatitude, Euler beta, in Probe Geometric (SPG) coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D spin period, regularized and boxcar averaged
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-D spin period, regularized and boxcar averaged

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D angle rotated since the sun sensor registered the sun pulse, regularized and boxcar averaged.
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-D angle rotated since the sun sensor registered the sun pulse, regularized and boxcar averaged.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Initial Spin Period for segment
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-D Initial Spin Period for segment

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Drift term for spin rate
Parameter.Description: Drift term for spin rate
Parameter.Caveats: Applies to angular velocity (deg/sec), not spin period.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Spin Correction
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-D Spin phase correction from definitive position and field model calculated at 1 minute intervals

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D  Spin axis right ascension
Parameter.Description: Spin axis right ascension correction from definitive position and field model

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Spin axis declination
Parameter.Description: Spin axis declination correction from definitive position and field model

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Maximum absolute phase error
Parameter.Description: Maximum absolute phase error between model and non-outlier sun crossing time
Parameter.Caveats: Errors due to recognized BAU timing errors do not contribute to this quantity

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Number of spins contained in this segment
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-D Number of spins contained in this segment

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Pulse Gap
Parameter.Description: Duration, in seconds, of longest gap between sun pulses in this segment. Long gaps (60 sec or more) will generally indicate shadow periods.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Position (GSE)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft position vector (km) in GSE coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Position (GSM)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft position vector (km) in GSM coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Velocity (GSE)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft velocity (km/s) in GSE coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-D Velocity (GSM)
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft velocity (km/s) in GSM coordinates
